summary: Mentally flat, no spark. Body rested but low clarity. Felt hollow reflecting on past projects. Confusion over which app to go all-in on. Logged patterns, but execution scattered. Tutor app now feels like the only viable wealth path.

wins: Reviewed all past builds and patterns clearly
losses: No real user traction from any app yet
ideas: Go all-in on Tutor App for real market and monetization

goals: Lock 3-day execution plan for Tutor App MVP
triggerEvents: Re-reading handwritten logs caused sharp clarity dip
